response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant value of $12,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product from me at a special price of $11,500. This offer is designed to provide you with substantial savings while ensuring you receive the highest-quality product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 11500}
